Install config

```
yarn add -D eslint-config-tiu
```

Install peer-deps

```
yarn add -D @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin@^4.4.1 eslint@^7.29.0 eslint-config-airbnb-typescript@^12.3.1 eslint-config-prettier@^8.3.0 eslint-plugin-import@^2.22.0 eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y@^6.3.1 eslint-plugin-react@^7.20.3 eslint-plugin-react-hooks@^4.0.8 prettier@^2.3.1 typescript@^4.3.4
```
